He blamed the Adani-Modi partnership, demonetization, flawed GST, and the failure of 'Assemble in India' for the economic decline. Trump criticized India's high tariffs and suggested India and Russia could face economic downturns together.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/stated-a-fact-rahul-gandhi-echoes-trumps-dead-economy-remark-on-india-takes-aim-at-pm-modi/articleshow/123015588.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/stated-a-fact-rahul-gandhi-echoes-trumps-dead-economy-remark-on-india-takes-aim-at-pm-modi/articleshow/123015588.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 13:54:55 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="807781" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123015572,imgsize-807781.cms"/></item><item><title>'Bhagwa ki vijay hui hai': Pragya Thakur breaks down after acquittal</title><description><![CDATA[Pragya Singh Thakur, after being acquitted in the 2008 Malegaon blasts case, declared it a victory for 'Bhagwa,' alleging a conspiracy to defame it. He highlights AI's accuracy limitations, emphasizing the ongoing necessity of human oversight for fact-checking and strategic decision-making. Benioff anticipates AI will fuel a surge in small business creation by democratizing access to enterprise-level tools.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/salesforce-ceo-marc-benioff-says-i-keep-asking-ceos-what-ai-are-they-using-for-these-big-layoffs-and-i-think-/articleshow/123014079.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/salesforce-ceo-marc-benioff-says-i-keep-asking-ceos-what-ai-are-they-using-for-these-big-layoffs-and-i-think-/articleshow/123014079.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 12:40:53 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="66660" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123014070,imgsize-66660.cms"/></item><item><title>IPL: KKR want KL Rahul in blockbuster trade; may make him captain</title><description><![CDATA[Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR) are reportedly interested in acquiring KL Rahul from Delhi Capitals for the 2026 IPL season, potentially offering him captaincy. Rahul's strong relationship with KKR's assistant coach Abhishek Nayar is a key factor. However, the trade might be difficult as KKR lacks suitable players to offer Delhi Capitals in return, after a disappointing 2025 season.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/ipl-kkr-want-kl-rahul-in-blockbuster-trade-may-make-him-captain/articleshow/123015677.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/ipl-kkr-want-kl-rahul-in-blockbuster-trade-may-make-him-captain/articleshow/123015677.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 13:59:43 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GAURAV GUPTA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="143700" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123015686,imgsize-143700.cms"/></item><item><title>UP Sawan Mela scare: Biker crashes mid-stunt in ‘Maut ka Kuan’</title><description><![CDATA[Panic at the Sawan fair in Maharajganj when a motorcycle stunt went awry at the 'Well of Death,' causing the rider to fall. The fallout could reshape how Indian families plan for international education.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/india-us-trade-deal-standoff-will-trumps-25-tariff-push-turn-the-american-dream-into-a-pricier-gamble-for-indian-students/articleshow/123014545.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/news/india-us-trade-deal-standoff-will-trumps-25-tariff-push-turn-the-american-dream-into-a-pricier-gamble-for-indian-students/articleshow/123014545.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 13:08:58 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI Education</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="135226" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123014997,imgsize-135226.cms"/></item><item><title>'There are only engineers': Musk corrects 'hiring post' of xAI's Aditya Gupta</title><description><![CDATA[Elon Musk's xAI is doing away with the title "researcher," opting for "engineer" for all technical roles, a decision prompted by Musk's direct intervention on X. While Delta acknowledged the rarity and unpredictability of turbulence, authorities are investigating the incident.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/delta-airlines-mishap-25-injured-after-severe-turbulence-hits-amsterdam-bound-flight-makes-emergency-landing-in-minneapolis/articleshow/123011571.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/delta-airlines-mishap-25-injured-after-severe-turbulence-hits-amsterdam-bound-flight-makes-emergency-landing-in-minneapolis/articleshow/123011571.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 10:53:58 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="554839" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123011634,imgsize-554839.cms"/></item><item><title>Chidambaram's jibe at PM after Trump tariffs; asks what happened to MIGA + MAGA?</title><description><![CDATA[US President Donald Trump's announcement of a 25% tariff on Indian imports sparked criticism. Kavin's parents are refusing to claim his body, demanding the arrest of Surjith's parents and action against allegedly complicit police officials.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/madurai/caste-killing-case-transferred-to-cb-cid-accused-detained-under-goondas/articleshow/123003302.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/madurai/caste-killing-case-transferred-to-cb-cid-accused-detained-under-goondas/articleshow/123003302.cms</guid><pubDate>Thu, 31 Jul 2025 08:39:24 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="499341" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123009720,imgsize-499341.cms"/></item><item><title>Watch: Australia’s first home-made rocket crashes 14 seconds after lift-off</title><description><![CDATA[Australia's first attempt to launch a domestically built rocket into orbit ended in failure as the Eris vehicle crashed shortly after liftoff from Queensland.       <description><![CDATA[“By combining Meta AI with WhatsApp, Meta appears capable of channelling its customer base into the emerging market, not through merit-based competition, but by “imposing” the availability of the two distinct services upon users, potentially harming competitors,” the Italian authority said.]]></description>

      <title><![CDATA[No interim US-India trade deal yet; Indian exporters brace for 20-25% tariffs as August 1 deadline nears]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/world/india-us-trade-deal-delay-trump-tariffs-impact-exporters-19644819.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Indian exporters are gearing up for possible US tariffs of 20–25% as the August 1 deadline set by President Trump approaches without an interim trade deal. While the tariff uncertainty has stalled orders, industry leaders say Indian exporters remain competitively placed compared to rivals like Bangladesh and China. Exporters expect the tariffs to impact profit margins more than supply chains, with fresh orders likely once clarity emerges post-deadline. Trade talks are set to resume in August as both countries work toward a broader agreement.]]></description>
      <pubDate><![CDATA[Mon, 28 Jul 2025 23:11:22 +0530]]></pubDate>
      <dc:creator>Swapnil Deshpande</dc:creator>
      <guid><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/world/india-us-trade-deal-delay-trump-tariffs-impact-exporters-19644819.htm]]></guid>
      <category><![CDATA[Business]]></category>
      <media:content height="675" width="1200" medium="image" url="https://images.cnbctv18.com/uploads/2021/03/IndiaUS_flag.jpg"/>
    </item>

      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/auto/india-ev-growth-strategy-startups-tech-innovation-product-proportion-pricing-rajeev-chaba-19643801.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[India’s electric vehicle (EV) growth story depends on getting the “three Ps” right—product, proportion, and pricing—says Rajeev Chaba, CEO Emeritus of JSW MG Motor India. Experts at a CNBC-TV18 panel discussion also highlighted the need for affordable compact EVs, indigenous motor technologies, and stronger support for startups to accelerate adoption and meet the country’s 2030 EV targets.]]></description>

      <description><![CDATA[India’s electric vehicle (EV) revolution is accelerating, fueled by the recent India–UK free trade agreement (FTA) and Tesla’s entry into the market, says industry veteran Pawan Goenka.       <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/market/tata-capital-ipo-valuation-raised-drhp-filing-19642326.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Sources say the company is likely to file its updated Draft Red Herring Prospectus (DRHP) as early as tomorrow or by the end of this week. Tata Capital plans to raise around $2 billion through the IPO, which is expected to launch in the first half of September this year. The IPO is being driven by a regulatory mandate. In September 2022, the Reserve Bank of India classified Tata Capital as an upper-layer systemically important NBFC, requiring it to go public within three years.
